full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BKA' DGE DGONGS PA GCIG BSGRUB KYI PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO GSAL BA'I SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013B ZHES RGYAL PO'I PHO BRANG 'PHYONG RGYAS STAG RTZE NAS RNAL 'BYOR DBANG PHYUG KUN SPANGS CHOS RJES DRIS PA'I LAN DU, BYA BTANG MA nI BHA DRAS (CHOS RGYAL RDO RJE TSE BRTAN PA, MKHAS GRUB NOR BZANG RGYA MTSO,) DBEN GNAS RIN CENG SGANG DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG SKYE BO MANG PO LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL PHYA RI DGA' LDAN PHUN TSOGS GLING DU PAR DU BSGRUBS PA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,
